recipeInstructions.@value:
Melt 1/4 pound butter, then add 1 tablespoon lemon juice and 2 medium pods
pressed garlic. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with very thin slices of lemon and fresh sprigs of parsley.

Cut the raw meat from the shell of the tail, but do not remove. Discard
the "apron" which protects the belly.

Pour butter sauce over lobster tails and bake at 300 degrees F until meat
is tender.
